pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gwget2 is a gtk2 front-end for the wget program. Wget is commonly used for retrieving files from the internet, and with an easy to use gtk2 interface, gwget2 brings the utility of wget to the GNOME desktop. Gwget2 supports drag and drop from most gtk2 compatible browsers, as well as the ability to pause and continue downloads over sessions.
